long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Edit & Blur: Customize Any Webpage Instantly

Effortlessly edit text, replace images, and blur content on any webpage. Perfect for quick mockups, demonstrating changes, and protecting sensitive information.

âœ¨ Key Features âœ¨
- Edit text directly on webpages
- Replace images with a double-click
- Blur sensitive content with ease

âœ¨ How to Use âœ¨
1. Click on the extension's icon to switch between the 3 modes: Normal, Edit, Blur
2. In Edit mode: Click or select text to replace it
3. In Edit mode: Double-click any image to replace it
4. In Edit mode: Select text and press Ctrl+R (Windows) or Cmd+R (Mac) to replace all occurrences
5. In Blur mode: Click any element once to blur it, click twice for extra blur, click again to unblur
6. Press ESC key anytime to return to Normal mode
